verses.verse: The plans <WH4633> of the heart <WH3820> belong to man, <WH120> but the answer <WH4617> of the tongue <WH3956> is from Yahweh. <WH3068>
All the ways <WH1870> of a man <WH376> are clean <WH2134> in his own eyes; <WH5869> but Yahweh <WH3068> weighs <WH8505> the motives. <WH7307>
Commit <WH1556> your deeds <WH4639> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and your plans <WH4284> shall succeed. <WH3559>
Yahweh <WH3068> has made <WH6466> everything for its own end <WH4617>â€” yes, <WH7563> even the wicked for the day <WH3117> of evil. <WH7563>
Everyone who is proud <WH1362> in heart <WH3820> is an abomination <WH8441> to Yahweh: <WH3068> they shall <WH3027> certainly <WH3027> not be unpunished. <WH5352>
By mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> iniquity <WH5771> is atoned <WH3722> for. <WH3374> By the fear of Yahweh <WH3068> men depart <WH5493> from evil. <WH7451>
When a man <WH376>'s ways <WH1870> please <WH7521> Yahweh, <WH3068> he makes even his enemies <WH341> to be at peace with him. <WH7999>
Better <WH2896> is a little <WH4592> with righteousness, <WH6666> than great <WH7230> revenues <WH8393> with injustice. <WH4941>
A man <WH120>'s heart <WH3820> plans <WH2803> his course, <WH1870> but Yahweh <WH3068> directs <WH3559> his steps. <WH6806>
Inspired judgments <WH7081> are on the lips <WH8193> of the king. <WH4428> He shall <WH4941> not betray <WH4603> his mouth. <WH6310>
Honest <WH4941> balances <WH3976> and scales <WH6425> are Yahweh <WH3068>'s; all the weights <WH68> in the bag <WH3599> are his work. <WH4639>
It is an abomination <WH8441> for kings <WH4428> to do <WH6213> wrong, <WH7562> for the throne <WH3678> is established <WH3559> by righteousness. <WH6666>
Righteous <WH6664> lips <WH8193> are the delight <WH7522> of kings. <WH4428> They value <WH157> one who speaks <WH1696> the truth. <WH3477>
The king <WH4428>'s wrath <WH2534> is a messenger <WH4397> of death, <WH4194> but a wise <WH2450> man <WH376> will pacify it. <WH3722>
In the light <WH216> of the king <WH4428>'s face <WH6440> is life. <WH2416> His favor <WH6440> is like a cloud <WH5645> of the spring rain. <WH4456>
How much better <WH2896> it is to get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451> than gold! <WH2742> Yes, <WH7069> to get understanding <WH998> is to be chosen <WH977> rather than silver. <WH3701>
The highway <WH4546> of the upright <WH3477> is to depart <WH5493> from evil. <WH7451> He who keeps <WH5341> his way <WH1870> preserves <WH8104> his soul. <WH5315>
Pride <WH1347> goes before <WH6440> destruction, <WH7667> and a haughty <WH1363> spirit <WH7307> before <WH6440> a fall. <WH3783>
It is better <WH2896> to be of a lowly <WH6035> spirit <WH7307> with the poor, <WH8217> than to divide <WH2505> the plunder <WH7998> with the proud. <WH1343>
He who heeds <WH7919> the Word <WH1697> finds <WH4672> prosperity. <WH2896> Whoever trusts <WH982> in Yahweh <WH3068> is blessed. <WH835>
The wise <WH2450> in heart <WH3820> shall be called <WH7121> prudent. <WH995> Pleasantness <WH4986> of the lips <WH8193> promotes <WH3254> instruction. <WH3948>
Understanding <WH7922> is a fountain <WH4726> of life <WH2416> to one who has <WH1167> it, <WH4148> but the punishment of fools <WH191> is their folly. <WH200>
The heart <WH3820> of the wise <WH2450> instructs <WH7919> his mouth, <WH6310> and adds <WH3254> learning <WH3948> to his lips. <WH8193>
Pleasant <WH5278> words <WH561> are a honeycomb, <WH6688> sweet <WH4966> to the soul, <WH5315> and health <WH4832> to the bones. <WH6106>
There is <WH3426> a way <WH1870> which seems right <WH3477> to <WH6440> a man, <WH376> but in the end <WH319> it leads <WH1870> to death. <WH4194>
The appetite of the laboring <WH6001> man <WH5315> labors <WH6001> for him; <WH6310> for his mouth urges him on. <WH404>
A worthless <WH1100> man <WH376> devises <WH3738> mischief. <WH7451> His speech <WH8193> is like a scorching <WH6867> fire. <WH784>
A perverse <WH8419> man <WH376> stirs <WH7971> up strife. <WH4066> A whisperer <WH5372> separates <WH6504> close friends. <WH441>
A man <WH376> of violence <WH2555> entices <WH6601> his neighbor, <WH7453> and leads <WH3212> him in a way <WH1870> that is not good. <WH2896>
One who winks <WH6095> his eyes <WH5869> to plot <WH2803> perversities, <WH8419> one who compresses <WH7169> his lips, <WH8193> is bent <WH3615> on <WH3615> evil. <WH7451>
Gray hair <WH7872> is a crown <WH5850> of glory. <WH8597> It is attained <WH4672> by a life <WH1870> of righteousness. <WH6666>
One who is slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> is better <WH2896> than the mighty; <WH1368> one who rules <WH4910> his spirit, <WH7307> than he who takes <WH3920> a city. <WH5892>
The lot <WH1486> is cast <WH2904> into the lap, <WH2436> but its every decision <WH4941> is from Yahweh. <WH3068>
